alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 21 at 6:55PM MST until December 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County and Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 8 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County
